Blog.post: went to east coast todae...jus to relax my mind....kinda stress...but i cant release my stress... not at all....so stress dat i tend 2 b blur n slow in catching up....haaiiizzzz....no comment on myself...jus fil its pathetic 2 b stress about..i guess i nid a rest....

hmm..jus reached home from werk..so tired...not much thing todae...jus keeping myself quiet as usual dis few daes...i think i cant wake up 2morow morning 4 skool...haiiizzz....i think i shud get a bath n get some sleep....

had a sleep dis afternoon...jus woke up an hour ago...but still feeling sleepy..haiizz....wat a life....bored life..so sian...mayb gonna sleep late again todae...hav not eaten..so hungry....no mood 2 eat...reali no mood todae..dunno y lar...2mrow skool again..so sick n tired of going skool....werking summore at 2 till nite..hope 2 enjoy my werk 2morow...i tink i nid 2 b alone 4 sumtime..mayb fridae i'm going out myself...release my stress...so stressssss....

urlLink mE iN cLasS LisTeNiNg To siCk S*n oF a Bi*cH TaLkiNg... urlLink dats me in hydraulic/pneumatic class listening 2 dat fu**er talking...so boring....futhermore i got no mood todae..not at all...i dun noe y...mayb jus my craziness...learnt sumting new at last...hehe for 2yrs i didnt even noe a single thing bout pneumatic,at last i noe how 2 fix all e stupid wirez....i was so heppy wen i opened up my letter box jus now....saw 2 letters for me....haha..at last i received my VISA n MASTERCARD...can go shopping...shop till i drop...yeah...must go shopping dis fridae..if i'm not lazi..i wonder wat can i do tonite......................??????????????

urlLink mE jUs cAme BacK FrOm sChOoL.. urlLink todae...so bored in skool...luckily finish 11.15...go home n sleep.....i dunno wat to do later on at nite..so bored staying at home....no life....i think i shud go out..mayb...if i'm not lazy....i mus not forget 2 do my diagram...if not tomorow die...see dat old man pathetic face again...sick!!!! gonna c him twice tomorow....tomorow skip class again n go back early...hahaha...3 wks in a row i skip Thinking Skills....haha morning got PE..no need 2 go...lazy.....

sooooo tired...jus came back from werk...todae is a great dae...lucky no fussy customer if not fight again like last satudae...wah....1 long dae todae...time past very slow...12 to 11pm i fil as if its 24hrs..so slow.... got cake todae from customer...hahaha...lucky i stole a slice of e cake 1st..if not,i wouldnt get to taste even a bit...nice chocolate cake huh.... ; ) tomorrow werk again...lucky until 5..if not die...cant wake up 4 school on mondae...got 2 sleep now................

yeah....at last i'm sick...i dun hav 2 go school....going 2 take my MC dis afternoon..but i fil like going out cos i'm bored staying at home...dis is all becoz of eating at BREKZ lar... but e food there is nice...better den Seoul Garden...got bored already..damn sian wif S.G food...everytime werk c e same old thing...hhhmmm...but werking at BREKZ seems 2 b great..mayb 1 dae i muz ask 4 an attachment there..half shift onli...i'll go crazi if doing full shift..futhermore on saturdaes...

wah....kena fuck again....bastard......dammit man......bring letter....but he throw away...fuck his mum lar....ask people 2 take leave e dae b4....he think wat...i'm werking wif him izit....stupid sia....i werk also wanna ask for MC or OFF 4 dat dae jus call up on e spot...but todae i jus kept quiet...lazy ar wanna fight...later kena send home again,my attendence rabak..c his face so old..later high blood pressure or hart attack n die...2 people who is reading dis,n thinking 2 go 2 ITE Balestier n taking mechatronics...think again...u will enjoy in ur 1st yr....but suffer in e 2nd yr.....some of e teachers r pathetic....

wah...feeling fuck up todae....kena sent home from school for nothing...but at least i got 2 fight wif e fucking teacher before i left e fucking class jus now....dat kind of teacher so pathetic sia....nvr c dat kind of teacher b4.... got send home bcoz i came late n nvr bring my CMPB check up letter...@#$%.......!!!!

didnt update 4 quite sumtyme....so i'm doing e full update... TUESDAE,17 AUGUST reached home around 12.30pm...took my lunch at home...vcant remember wat i ate.. go online playin sum games...supposed 2 b out to town wif yazid n e clown....both buih!!!! dat clown got even time 2 sleep..so everyting cancelled n i wen i took a nap...woke up at 6 n got ready 2 fetch dee from skool...khekhe....sooo heppi.. ; ) met her at khatib at 8.20..took 39 to pasir ris....its e 1st time......both of us talk smoothly..non-stop.....hahahaa....so glad we did it at last...hehee..we did talk a lot of things todae..bout e past..bout manazil n mary...hahaha..........i'm so heppy todae ; ) but not dat heppy yet...jus havin a heppy ending 4 e dae....cant wait fer 2morow...going out 2 play pool wif dee n mary...cant wait...... MONDAE,16 AUGUST met mary at woodlands mrt planning to play pool...but didnt get 2 go in as she didnt bring along her IC or student pass...so walked her home n lepak under aliff'z block..he came later on..n talk shit...hahaha....he send me home later on wif his bike...worst den yazid..his cornering fucking swee....almost fell backwards wen he jus sped off... SUNDAE 15 AUGUST werk in e morning...tried calling dee but cudnt reached her....damn worried...from e afternoon till e nite she off her hp....wat went wrong.....???? wen to play pool at park lane wif alim,faizal n baz...den walked to esplanade 2 watch e firewerks...halfwae through,wen to a foodcourt coz i nid e loo....damn....i was rushing n wen suddenli i opened e glass door..n wen i wanted 2 go in,my knee hit onto e glass door...damn loud....luckily no one was near me...i stopped n waited 4 e pain to ease....but no....till now,my knee still hurt....its been 2 daes.....i cudnt walk properly actuali...but tried 2 walk normally...reached esplanade at around 7.30...its damn packed........e pyrotechnics blew up at 8.. its damn nice...after dat back 2 outlet as we noe dat e train,bus n cab will b full...reached outlet at 9.. tried calling dee..but still its off......damn worried bout her cos didnt hear from her from morning sia...... at last..i got through her around 11....feel much better.......thank god.... SATURDAE 14 AUGUST nothing much..werking in e afternoon cos tot of going CIP in e morning..but didnt turned up.. FRIDAE 13 AUGUST hhhmm...fridae e 13th.......crap!!!! met dee,lina n mary at town,at wisma...den head to BK liat towers..lepak ther...dee hav 2 go off at 6..so send her to e bustop n waited 4 e bus...talked a bit better....den wen back 2 mit mary n lina..played pool at far east shopping centre...den head 2 cineleisure n had dinner wif lina sis n fauzi...mary wen back....den we got nowhere 2 go n wen 2 esplanade...lepak there n talked bout ourself..wen off bout 10.30...send lina home n head 2 hougang...mit up wif james,dog n clown...lepak at evergreen condo..till 3 we wen off..reached home at 4...after sending those bastards home...

jus reach home from werk....kindda tiring....hhmmm......wearing a white contact lenses is a center of attraction....hahaha....attracted sum actors n actresses who was doing their movie at my werkplace...hahaha....arrr......Rozalina from BARA 2 was there!!!! kept staring at my eyes....hahaha...shez sweet man.......!!darlina,shah & ezlan was there...wif 2 other actresses.....e producer was azroy...e make up artist did ask bout my contact lenses...coz they nid 2 get it 4 e upcoming drama...its bout a ghost story...shah kept asking bout my eyes...crazi...hahah..1 of e actress,a model said dat my eyes luks great..hahaha thanx..hhmmm...me n iskandar also received sumting....hehehe azroy sound us...to get into acting...hahaha....eaglevision is trying 2 record a teenage movie...n they nid actor n actresses......they asked e both of us 2 send a resume....n asked us 2 get sum gerls along......kinda interest me....but too shy 2 go 4 it....shud i or shudnt i....?? went to tanglin police station after werk......nid 2 settle faizal's case...poor him.......itz becoz of his carelessness.....hhmm....tink i nid 2 go.....

MONDAE,9th AUGUST msg dee in msn..i tot e plan is not going 2 happen....i'm looking forward for tonite...we're planning 2 watch e pyrotechnics at esplanade...met lina at 4...walked around bugis...met bat,den mary..den dee.....gosshh....shez wearing dat mango thingy........arrrghh......den came her fren sarah...met jill n his talak under e ECP....took a cab to kallang mrt..watching e pyrotechnics at kallang river....kept myself quiet....reali wanna talk to dee...but i'm jus scared....scared dat she'll be angry n i wud ruin e dae....n dee...if u're reading dis,sorie dat i nvr layan u...jus scared....n sorie dat i crossed e road w/o waiting 4 u.....reali sorie.....went to town n had dinner at BK...later came lina's sis....wen back at 10.30 sharp...took a cab wif lina n dee...send lina den dee...tried talking to her but she doesnt seems interested in talking......sorie 4 everyting dee.......... i reali regret sumting.......not talking to dee...n my mind kept replaying wat happened on mondae.....dammit man....!!!! reali regret it............arggghhh..... it kept playing n playing.....................................i jus wish i can happen again....but fuck.......it cant...national dae is over......................f#%$!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! SUNDAE,8th AUGUST as per normal...werk in e morning but doing full shift todae...having split shift at 3 to 5...went to town 2 get some stuff n back to werk...ends early todae...10.15..so early.........called lina to confirm bout tomorrowz plan...but can tget thru....so called dee,n seems shez not heppy wif me.....haaiiiizz....jus hopin evertingz going fine 2morow..... SATURDAE,7th AUGUST as usual...went to werk early in e morning.....so on n so on....finished werk bout 11....dats usual 4 weekends...reach home around 12...watching tv n was soooooo shocked dat lina msg me....called her n talk wif her...bla bla bla.........

i've jus reach home....................................hmmm...todae was a great dae....quite lar....but not dat great....went out to town n wait 4 yazid...as usual wif his timing....janji melayu lar kater kan...asked me 2 mit him at 3.30 sumwhere around town..i reached at bout 2.15..walking alone by myself as usual....tried called kakak but she off her handphone...wen n look 4 her at her werkplace but shez not ther...i miss kakak....so long nvr go out wif her n abang....miss going out wif e both of dem...but wen 3.30 comes,he didnt turn up..idiot.....at 5 he told me he was still at queenswae...n he told me 2 mit haizal n his fren 1st...met dem at 5.30.....den walk around till 7...kip calling yazid but bloody hell dat idiot nvr pick up his fone...he picked up after i called at 7.40..e next plan was.......we bought a laffing gas....hahhaa...it's been month nvr took it..we took it beside Ngee Ann City...therz an area 2 lepak....sat ther....took dat thing....wah....!! i ZEH terok sia todae....i took 70% of dat bottle..ZEH 3 times..almost wen rolling down e stairs..but thanx 2 dem...ey saved me.......nvr been high like dis b4...terok sia todae..over so many bottles i've taken dis is e worst....i nid 2 get over it dats y i took more...power sia....like 1 bloody lost guy....can get brain damage n lung problem sia...e shocking part,wen i lay my elbow at e top part of e stairs,i felt sumting..its like i put my elbow on sumting...but wen i lifted my elbow..ther was nothing...after dat wen 2 far east 2 lepak again...on our wae..yazid n hamzah suddenli stopped walking..both at e same pace...both of dem was shock as wen ey r walking,ey felt like sumting was pulling dem up..as if ey walking on air...both told us e same thing...so shock man...den we got no plan n called dat dog....he was near a coffeeshop at punggol...waited 4 yazid at hougang...e took another helmet...wen he reached he told me he was scared...he said i was e 1st pillion....my heartbeat suddenli beats so fast...wat e @#!%..... nvr told me earlier..nvm...jus go 4 it....maximum will jus b an accident...wah....he ride his bike like as if he wanna race...kept braking...e bike will go jerking n jerking..he kept whacking his bike.......almost kena buang...not once but 3 times............!!!met those idiot..e dog,e clown,taufik n 2 of those idiots fren,james n joshua...den took a cab 2 james condo...evergreen park....lepak 4 1hr den cabot wif yazid....he's going johore...b4 dat we lepak at seletar damp...wah.. a lot of hot cars sia...got modified EVO,Civic.....got dis insane guy doing wheelie on his CBR...crazi....even therz a gerl riding CBR..shocking sia...mayb 2morow nite going ther again....its a saturdae nite....definitely more hot cars..got 2 sleep...werking 2morow morning...damn....lazi ar..hard 4 me 2 sleep....not eaten also...jus ate onli 2 pieces of epok2....no appetite.....at all......got 2 sleep......nitez.....zZZzZZzzzZZzzZZZzzZZZZzzzZZZZZZzzzzzzzZZZZ........................

hhmm..i shud b werking todae....but i didnt turn up.......but sumting actuali happen wen i go out jus now..infact i dunno whether to kip dat in mind or jus to ignore......1st i felt sumone was tapping my shoulder from e back...i got shock n turned....e tapped was a soft one...but i got shocked coz i'm alone n i'm dreaming on jus say i'm thinking...i turned n therz no 1 behind me....e 2nd one.....i heard sumone whispering into my ears...but wen i turned,i onli saw nobody as i was going down e escalator....izit happening to me or was it jus my thinking...till now i kept having dat on my mind...still can remember how e touch was....but i cant hear e whisper properly........wat was it telling me??i tend to ignore but i jus cant..stil on my mind...arrgghh...i'm not scared...but was jus thinking....wat was it all about....my balls wont go up to my throat.......but jus curious over it....every1 will b curious if it happens 2 dem...hhhhmmm....mayb i mus go 2 e park 2morow nite...at 7pm....or after 10pm....mayb i can find out wats happening....du i nid sum1 2 accompany me???or mayb i shud go myself?? we'll c how 2morow...i'm not going skool 2morow.....lazy...going skool is sooo sick....dats all 4 tonite...going 2 watch some movie...mayb write more later.....

waaaahhh....todae tiok 1 more time...worst sia....i noe e worst gonna happenn.... but didnt xpect anyting worst...but it already happen......haaiizzz...went town 4 sum shopping again......got myself a FOX t-shirt n SHIFT lanyard..as usual those kinda stuffz at Profile Asia...i jus nid 2 spent $300 ther 2 get their membership card....i reali wanna hav it...mayb next month i'm gonna spend $300..may going 2 get dat thing.......Replica!!!!!! wish 2 hav it....but i muz get dat....b4 dat wen 2 eat den watch movie....The Sisters......dont watch it.....fucking lame......i slept halfwae e movie.....nonsense sia......after dat,it all happen in split seconds.......tiok again....lucky nvr kena shoot......kena shoot lagi worst...lucky tiok a bit....but heart shatters ar...worst den a piece of broken glass....alwaes tiok 1 sia.....reali hate it....jus hard 2 get over it.....

TUESDAE,3rd AUGUST hhhmmm.......i went out but i dunno where did i go......reali cant remember.....????where did i go?????!! i noe it was damn lame going 2 skool todae..very lame......tiok todae.....haaiizz....i knew its gonna happen......alwaes tiok one...nvr on e ball....dammit lar.......

MONDAE,2nd August hhhmmmmm.....went home back quickly taking a cab back home...gotta go 4 sum shopping...so bored staying at home..meeting my frens at 6.30pm at town..wen i reached there...me n dee..they left us behind jus like dat......basket........~~!!!! got perfume 4 myself n my fren's..arghhhh....so sian......reached home bout 11.30....so early....n so bored..........
